Leading Residence
by Investment Programs

High-net-worth individuals with talent and resources are not confined to one country in their personal and business pursuits. The golden visa programs, known as residence by investment programs, offer the opportunity for affluent individuals to move to a new country and enjoy the privileges of living, working, studying, and accessing healthcare in their chosen destination. The ability to switch residence to a desirable country or maintain multiple residences plays a crucial role in the strategic planning of global affairs for affluent clients.

Home
/
Residence Programs
  • Spain
    The Spain Residence by Investment Program enables individuals to live, work and study in Spain, as well as travel visa-free in Europe's Schengen Area.
    Spain Residence
  • France
    Citizenship by Naturalisation for Exceptional Services by Direct Investment. This process offers the world’s strictest due diligence standards and vetting.
    France Residence
  • ItalY
    Italy has two residence options for investors seeking visa-free travel across Europe’s Schengen Area. No permanent stay is required. Investment is from EUR 250,000.
    ItalY Residence
  • Switzerland
    By making an annual tax contribution of at least CHF 250,000, individuals can secure residence in Switzerland through the Swiss Residence Program.
    Switzerland Residence
  • MoNTENEGRO
    The Montenegro Citizenship by Investment Program was concluded on 31 December 2022. Contact us to find the best alternative citizenship for you and your family.
    MoNTENEGRO Residence
  • Cosra RICA
    For just $150,000, investors in Costa Rica gain entry to dynamic urban centers, political security, and opportunities within the Central American market.
    Cosra RICA Residence
  • IRELAND
    The Türkiye Citizenship by Investment Program provides citizenship of a country with links to both Asia and Europe and access to the markets in both regions.
    IRELAND Residence
  • SINGAPORE
    Antigua and Barbuda offers one of the most competitive citizenship programs in the Caribbean. Options start from USD 230,000.
    SINGAPORE Residence
  • Portugal
    The Spain Residence by Investment Program is a pathway to visa-free travel in Europe’s Schengen Area and offers the right to live, work, and study in Spain.
    Portugal Residence
  • Netherlands
    Citizenship by Naturalisation for Exceptional Services by Direct Investment. This process offers the world’s strictest due diligence standards and vetting.
    Netherlands Residence
  • Monaco
    Italy has two residence options for investors seeking visa-free travel across Europe’s Schengen Area. No permanent stay is required. Investment is from EUR 250,000.
    Monaco Residence
  • Luxembourg 
    The Swiss Residence Program guarantees residence in Switzerland for a minimum contribution of CHF 250,000 in annual taxes.
    Luxembourg  Residence
  • Thailand
    The Montenegro Citizenship by Investment Program was concluded on 31 December 2022. Contact us to find the best alternative citizenship for you and your family.
    Thailand Residence

    Honk Kong Residence

    Indonesia Residence

    Malta Residence
